resources.string: HAVE A HAPPY NAP \nTHANKS FOR USING US \n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t :)

PROJECT NAME : THE NAP TAKER
DEVELOPER : KARAN BHATIA


DESCRIPTION :
 IT IS A BASIC ANDROID APP TO PROVIDE USERS OF THE APP WITH A PROPER AND EFFICIENT NAP. 

THIS IS REALLY NECESSARY IN SUCH BUSY SCHEDULE OF PEOPLE TO TAKE NAP ELSE BRAIN CAN'T WORK WITH FULL EFFICIENCY. APP COMES WITH FEW SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN NAPS AND USER CAN ADD MORE CUSTOM ACCORDING TO NEED. IT ALSO COMES WITH REMINDER SERVICE WHICH WILL REMIND USER TO TAKE NAP.
